description: This file defines a TypeScript class 'TemplateService' that provides methods for managing templates via API calls, including CRUD operations, rendering, validation, testing, and variable management.

classes.name: TemplateService
classes.description: A class that encapsulates API interactions related to templates, including fetching, creating, updating, deleting, rendering, validating, and testing templates.

methods.name: getTemplates
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of templates with optional search query.

methods.name: getTemplate
methods.description: Retrieves a specific template by its ID.

methods.name: createTemplate
methods.description: Creates a new template with provided data.

methods.name: updateTemplate
methods.description: Updates an existing template identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteTemplate
methods.description: Deletes a template by its ID.

methods.name: renderTemplate
methods.description: Renders a template with specified variables.

methods.name: validateTemplate
methods.description: Validates the syntax and correctness of a template.

methods.name: testTemplate
methods.description: Tests a template with a specific test case.

methods.name: runAllTests
methods.description: Runs all test cases for a template.

methods.name: getTemplatesByDevice
methods.description: Fetches templates filtered by device type.

methods.name: cloneTemplate
methods.description: Clones an existing template with a new name.

methods.name: exportTemplate
methods.description: Exports a template as a downloadable file.

methods.name: importTemplate
methods.description: Imports a template from a file.

methods.name: getTemplateVariables
methods.description: Retrieves variables defined in a template.

methods.name: addTestCase
methods.description: Adds a new test case to a template.

methods.name: deleteTestCase
methods.description: Deletes a specific test case from a template.
